articles.description: Saylor will stay on as executive chairman and says the move will allow him to double down on the company's "Bitcoin acquisition strategy."

articles.title: OpenSea NFT Gifting Feature Raises Concerns About Mislabeled Transactions

articles.description: After adopting Bitcoin and Ethereum, and making NFT and metaverse plays, Gucci is apeing in.

articles.description: Phishing remains the most popular form of cyberattack. Here's how to protect yourself, your crypto and your NFTs.
articles.title: Cybersecurity in Web3: Protecting Yourself (And Your Ape JPEG)

articles.description: The company’s crypto unit violated state anti-money laundering and cybersecurity measures.
articles.title: Robinhood Crypto Slapped With $30M Fine by New York Regulators

articles.description:
In our latest Decrypt on the Street segment, reporter Sander Lutz investigates Chipotle’s recent crypto marketing campaign and talks to Chipotle customers about their sadness amid the crypto crash. 

Sander himself entered the contest hoping to get rich; instead he got a single cup of queso dip.
articles.title: Decrypt on the Street: Chipotle Says ‘Buy the Dip!’

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Recently valued at $1.6 billion, Magic Eden will begin its multi-chain expansion with Ethereum in the coming weeks.
articles.title: Solana Unicorn Magic Eden Expands NFT Marketplace to Ethereum

articles.description: Decrypt's Jason Nelson reports from NFT Expoverse in LA with JP Bedoya, Chief Product Officer at Civic, the Web3 identity verification problem rolling out a new set of tools to keep people from spamming NFT drops to take advantage.
articles.title: How Civic Is Battling Web3 Bots and Spam: CPO JP Bedoya

articles.author: Stephan Roth
articles.description: After approving its “DeFi Revival Plan,” the Waves community is looking to make back lost funds following the depegging of its stablecoin.
articles.title: Waves Community Backs Plan to Reimburse $500M of Lost DeFi Funds

articles.description: North Korean hackers are suspected of copying resumes and LinkedIn profiles to land jobs at crypto firms—sometimes successfully.
articles.title: Cybercriminals Plagiarize LinkedIn, Indeed Profiles to Apply for Crypto Jobs: Report

articles.description: A recent report from Bank of America identified several bullish trends in the crypto market, indicating investors may be changing sentiment.

articles.description: “There was always risk,” said the NWSL after indicating that players may not see their crypto cashout following Voyager Digital’s bankruptcy.

articles.description: As Ethereum takes the final steps towards its upgrade, some miners and users are increasingly worried about its future.

articles.description: One of the earliest NFT projects is seeing renewed interest thanks to the iconic jewelry brand.

articles.description: Using XRPL, Colombian leaders can make real estate transactions more equitable.

articles.description: The SEC accused Forsage of raising funds illicitly for over two years.
articles.title: SEC Charges ‘Fraudsters’ in $300 Million ‘Crypto Pyramid and Ponzi Scheme’

articles.description: The Bitcoin market downturn has halted construction on mining sites and dropped the price of mining equipment—but also created opportunities for a few companies.
articles.title: What Bitcoin Miners Are Doing to Survive the Bear Market

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: Craig Wright was awarded just £1 in the Peter McCormack case after putting forward “deliberately false” evidence, said the UK’s High court.
articles.title: Self-Professed 'Bitcoin Inventor' Craig Wright Advanced ‘False Evidence’ in Libel Lawsuit: UK Court

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: Chiliz has acquired nearly a quarter of FC Barcelona's Barça Studios, enabling the club to build better NFT and metaverse projects.
articles.title: Crypto Firm Chiliz Nabs $100M Stake in FC Barcelona's Digital Studio

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Crypto fell outside the UK’s financial regulator's new guidelines targeting high-risk investment products. But that may soon change, said the FCA.
articles.title: UK's New Financial Promotion Guidelines Don't Include Crypto—Yet

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Ledger is in talks to raise $100 million. Sources say that business is growing as investors turn to cold storage to safeguard their crypto.
articles.title: Crypto Wallet Maker Ledger Eyes Fresh $100M Raise: Report

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: British rock band Muse’s upcoming new album will be released as a limited-edition NFT on the Polygon-powered platform Serenade.
articles.title: Muse to Release Next Album on Polygon-based NFT Platform Serenade

articles.author: Jeff Benson,Sander Lutz
articles.description: DeFi protocol Aave is one of the largest lenders of cryptocurrency and its AAVE token has a larger market cap than rivals Maker or Compound. Here's how it works.
articles.title: What Is Aave? Inside the DeFi Lending Protocol

articles.description: Art Blocks, the generative NFT series, exploded in popularity and price last fall. Art Blocks founder Erick Calderon (aka "Snowfro") talks to Dan Roberts and Stephen Graves all about why the price surge actually hurt Art Blocks and the problem with NFT speculators, the debate over digital art vs. traditional art and his views on Bored Apes and CryptoPunks, how he got into NFTs after starting a physical tile business with his father, and why he thinks everyone's mortgage will eventually be stored on chain.
articles.title: gm: Art Blocks Founder Erick Calderon is Finding the 'Soul' in Generative Art NFTs

articles.description: The former Amazon Studios exec and venture capitalist spoke with Decrypt’s Kate Irwin about how crypto fits into the metaverse at an event in Beverly Hills, California.
articles.title: Matthew Ball on the Role of Crypto and NFTs in the Metaverse

articles.description: In an extensive conversation with Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott, Binance CEO CZ talks global and US regulation, Binance HQ locations, crypto bailouts and how he approaches deals, the sports marketing push by big crypto exchanges and why Binance went slower, and why he believes we live in a simulation.
articles.title: gm: Binance CEO CZ Talks Bailouts, Regulator Demands, and Simulation Theory

articles.description: Chelsea Manning, who gave classified documents regarding the wars in Afghanistan and Iraq to WikiLeaks in 2010, talked to Decrypt's Stacy Elliott about crypto and privacy, decentralization and government, and her work with Nym.
articles.title: Chelsea Manning Talks Crypto, Privacy, and Security

articles.description: In an interview for Decrypt's gm podcast, CZ laid out Binance's approach to "bailouts" amid the crypto liquidity crunch, and criticized Alameda's complicated lifeline to Voyager.
articles.title: Binance CEO CZ on Crypto Bailouts and the Deals He Would Not Do

articles.description: Wyoming Sen. Cynthia Lummis, the "Bitcoin Senator," joined Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott on the gm podcast to talk about the Lummis-Gillibrand crypto regulation bill, the need for clearer policy on crypto in DC, and converting crypto skeptics—plus her take on the bear market and NFTs. Make sure to subscribe to the podcast.
articles.title: gm: Senator Cynthia Lummis Is Fighting for Bitcoin
